One way to interpret the above is as follow, geometric(p)=# of flips needed to get 1 H when tossing coin repeatedly. Tossing the coin several times without seeing 1 H, is the same as starting over. In other words, previous failed tosses does not impact how many remaing flips are, and the reason is because coin flips are independent.
